cards.title: Lord of Magic
quotes: I am all that is left of my tribe, but I'm not alone.
cards.description: Half human, half demon. He is the last surviving member of his Tride, and has been chosen as the champion of Eastern Kingdoms. His magical mastery is un-paralleled. Known as the Dread Lord, amongst many demons.
cards.author: Danilkant

cards.title: Marcus, The Agile
cards.description: Grand Darker-hunter. A representitive of the Darker Council. Well known for his daring battles against the X-Y Darkers and the countless lives he has saved.
cards.author: Danilkant

cards.title: Lucas, The Corrupted
cards.description: Champions of his faction, even his enemies avoid his presence. Rumors say that his touch can kill anyone opposing him.
cards.author: Danilkant
